item.description:
Tuesday night boardgaming at Jeff's. Since we plan to be a much smaller group than Monday nights at Borders, we are focusing on non-party games. Our first meetup for example we played San Juan, Acquire, Yspahan and ended with Coloretto.

Where is Windham? About 15 minutes from exit 2 off the Everett Turnpike (Rt. 3) and about 10 minutes from exit 3 or 4 off Rt. 93 (Windham borders Pelham, Hudson, Salem, Londonderry and Derry). We plan to rotate hosting duties in this area from week to week (last one was in Londonderry).

group.name: The Greater Nashua Gamers Meetup Group

item.name: Gaming in Windham
